dt.t: Despite his victories, Themistocles was {it}ostracized{/it} by the Athenians.

dt: {bc}to exclude from a group by common consent

dt.t: a lonely dissenter, {it}ostracized{/it} as an enemy of the people

et: borrowed from Greek {it}ostrakízein{/it} "(in 5th-century Athens) to banish an individual chosen after a vote taken by writing names on potsherds," from {it}óstrakon{/it} "earthen vessel, potsherd" + {it}-izein{/it} {et_link|-ize|-ize} {ma}{mat|ostracon|}{/ma}
shortdef: to exclude from a group by common consent
